title: Zuckerberg abandons his VR dreams; budget cuts and 1,500 jobs gone

While Reality Labs saw significant cuts and studios shuttered, Valecillos is now focused on VR programs, signaling continued commitment to the technology's future.

description: In a significant post-poll development, the Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) has extended support to the Shiv Sena in the Kalyan–Dombivli Municipal Corporation. This alliance, with MNS's five corporators backing the Shiv Sena's 53, brings the total to 58, inching closer to the required majority for forming the civic body's government.

After the incident, BJP MLA Gouri Sankar attacked Mamata Banerjee for instigating her party cadres across the state to commit riots and violence.

Since 2021, rule by rule: How the Taliban have erased women from public life
description: Since the Taliban's return in August 2021, Afghan women's basic freedoms have been systematically curtailed, transforming them into privileges. Girls are barred from secondary education and universities, most jobs are off-limits, and public spaces are restricted, severely shrinking women's public existence amid economic collapse.

description: Royal Challengers Bengaluru players Lauren Bell, Nadine de Klerk, and Georgia Voll were spotted enjoying a morning walk in Vadodara ahead of WPL 2026 matches, delighting fans. The outing highlighted player safety concerns after last year’s Australian women cricketers’ harassment in Indore. BCCI condemned the incident, praising prompt police action, while ensuring stricter security protocols for visiting players.

description: Shubman Gill wants India’s Test regulars to feature in the Ranji Trophy to ensure red-ball readiness ahead of the Sri Lanka tour, which is scheduled in August later this year. At the same time, the management is firming up 2027 ODI World Cup plans, with a focus on middle-overs penetration and building a fast-bowling core.

title: Sanjay Dutt spotted driving Tesla Cybertruck on Mumbai streets
description: In the US, the Tesla Cybertruck is priced from around $80,000, with higher-spec variants commanding a significantly higher premium. The Cybertruck stands out for its bold, sci-fi-inspired styling that breaks away from conventional pickup design. Its silhouette is sharply tapered, almost wedge-like, with flat surfaces, crisp angles, and pronounced creases dominating the exterior. Adding to its distinctive appearance are the minimalist full-width light bars at both ends.

Prayagraj: IAF trainer aircraft crashes in pond; both pilots rescued
description: On Wednesday, a microlight trainer aircraft from the Indian Air Force made an unexpected plunge into a pond in Prayagraj. Thankfully, the brave pilots were safely extracted from the water after the incident. This mishap is the second of its kind this month, following a regional flight's emergency landing near Rourkela on January 10, where everyone on board emerged unscathed.

description: Veteran investor George Noble warns OpenAI is "falling apart" despite its $500 billion valuation. He cites internal "Code Red" alerts, declining ChatGPT traffic, massive quarterly losses of $12 billion, and unsustainable costs for tools like Sora. Key departures and Elon Musk's lawsuit further highlight significant internal turmoil and financial strain.

Trump vs Khamenei: US president's 'wipe them off' warning to Tehran's 'will cut that hand' threat
description: United States President Donald Trump on Tuesday said America would wipe out Iran if the Islamic nation assassinates him. Trump's remark came hours after Iran warned him not to take any action against the country's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.  Trump had previously said he's given his advisors instructions to obliterate Iran if the country is behind an assassination of him.

title: Daniel Naroditsky had multiple drugs in system at time of death, toxicology report says
Man fined Rs 150 for running over and killing dog with Mercedes
description: A man who fatally struck a dog with his Mercedes-Benz in 2024 received a Rs 150 fine from a North Goa court. Following a viral video, animal cruelty charges were filed. The accused pleaded guilty, citing it as an involuntary, first-time offense. His lawyer highlighted his age and sole breadwinner status, requesting leniency.

title: A new low for rupee! Currency falls over 60 paise; reaches 91.74 against US dollar
description: The Indian rupee hit a new low of 91.20 against the US dollar on Wednesday, extending its downward trend. This depreciation is attributed to strong dollar demand from metal importers, continued foreign fund outflows, and geopolitical uncertainties. The domestic stock market's sluggish performance also contributed to the rupee's decline.

title: Kanpur shocker: Another teen kidnapped, gang-raped by 2 youths
description: A 13-year-old girl was allegedly kidnapped and gang-raped by two youths in Kanpur's Bilhaur area on Monday night. The victim, who went to an outdoor washroom, was reportedly taken to a nearby house. She returned home hours later and informed her family. A complaint has been filed, and police are actively searching for the accused.

title: Delhi Police arrests youth over viral video of zigzagging through traffic on NH-48
description: Delhi Police apprehended a 21-year-old IGNOU student for allegedly driving an SUV recklessly on NH-48. A viral video prompted swift action, leading to the vehicle's seizure and the driver's arrest. The incident, which occurred on January 18th, endangered commuters, prompting charges under the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita and Motor Vehicles Act.

title: Md Shami, with 462 wickets for India, falls in line for SIR
description: Md Shami, the Indian cricket sensation, took a bold stand for democracy as he attended a voter hearing in Kolkata, wholeheartedly affirming his citizenship. Under scrutiny as an 'unmapped voter' due to his parents' details, Shami brought along his passport to validate his identity and showcased his dedication to the community he represents.

title: ‘Your career’s ruined’: Judge warns TISS students linked to Saibaba event
description: In a striking pronouncement, a Mumbai court sounded the alarm for nine TISS students applying for anticipatory bail, warning that their alleged connection to a criminal case could jeopardize their professional paths. The students are being probed for initiating an unauthorized gathering in honor of a professor currently imprisoned over suspected Maoist affiliations.

title: B'desh crisis: Centres urges kin of officials to leave Dhaka; uptick in anti-India stirs
description: In response to escalating anti-India protests and potential violence in Bangladesh, India has advised families of its diplomats and officials stationed there to return home. This precautionary measure aims to ensure safety, though all Indian missions and posts in Bangladesh remain fully operational. The situation is temporary and will be reassessed.

title: 'Let's buy California': Danish satire petition counters Trump's Greenland move
Delhi Metro commuter caught urinating on platform, flees after being recorded
description: A video of a man urinating in a Delhi Metro station sparked outrage online, prompting the Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC) to appeal for passenger cooperation in maintaining cleanliness. Commuters condemned the act as shameful and urged authorities for strict penalties and better enforcement to uphold hygiene standards.

title: Klay Thompson’s heartfelt gesture for Megan Thee Stallion leaves fans emotional
description: Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion have inspired billions around the world with the love and commitment they have shown towards each other over the past few months. While Megan Thee Stallion has often spoken out about how grateful she is for Klay Thompson, the star player’s recent gesture has sparked chaos among fans.
